评论概述: They sent me the wrong size
评论详情: They sent me a large shirt instead of the medium size that I ordered. The shirt does not fit me. It seems really good quality I’m just sad I didn’t get the right size and I can’t wear it.
Love the material and fit !

The quality of the fabric is nice and it's super comfy. I have a really short torso, so I knew this would end up being the length I wanted. I got this top in black as well. I love that they're not see through. I got both of mine for less than $8 each! I will get more colors.
Comfortable, flattering, and retains shape. I bought 4 more colors!

评论概述: Cute top and very versatile to style - staple basic piece
评论详情: Cute top to style with various outfits. it's a great basic to include in your closet! only issue i can think of is it was a little loose in the bust area for me, but nothing too bad. looks great with a pair of jeans!

评论用户: Very comfortable, true to example pic. It's very tight but also very thin material!
评论详情: The material is very thin and comfortable, while still being really flattering. Absolutely love, I will probably be getting other colors!

评论概述: Super Soft Comfy Long Sleeve Top
评论详情: I  bought this long-sleeved light pink top. It's soft, stretchy, and breathable. You can wear it by itself or layer it. You will need a T-shirt bra underneath this top because it's form-fitting. Very comfortable top I must-have in multiple colors.

Really pleased with the quality and material of this shirt ! It is form fitting but not suffocating where it shows all your bumps ! It is much thicker than I expected and sooo comfy ! The arms are nice and long which I love bc I am tall and that is hard to find ! The bow on top gives it a cute feminine look! 5 stars for sure !

评论概述: The bow is super dainty and cute.
评论详情: It’s not my favorite double lined shirt that I have but the details are super cute. It’s just not that buttery soft comfortable material that I like on double lined shirts. It’s more of a thick stiffer material. It’s not super stretchy so I would make sure you get the right size because it’s not gonna be super forgiving. Also the neckline just like it’s advertised in the pictures super wide, so most brawls are gonna show in that. Just keep that in mind. But it is super cute and trendy for the price.
I liked this product so much that I ordered it in another color

Super cute and good quality. the square neck is extremely flattering especially if you have a larger chest, it is cut a little wide though and i can only wear certain bras or they will show but other than that great
Nice material very cute but it is a little tight

Cute shirt, not fancy quality but decent. I got the light pink color and it’s so pretty, but sheer once I put it on. The shirt isn’t too small, as there is baggy areas around the shoulders and bust area so I think I should’ve sized down for a more flattering fit. However it would probably be more sheer if I had. The darker colors may be more successful. I got it super cheap with a coupon so I’ll still use as a sleep shirt or something.
Fits well and is good quality. Makes the girls look nice!

I’ve been looking for some long sleeved casual shirts that I’m not worried about ruining on the job (hairdresser) but still feel pulled together. I’ve bought a couple from this brand and feel like if you’re paying about $10 it’s fine. I am very petite (5ft) and prefer extra smalls. The taupey brown color is very pretty but it’s just a little too wide so if you have maybe a fuller chest or wider shoulders this would work better. I’ve washed it a few times and it’s fine. I just wish it was a tighter fit so it would be flattering.
Very cute shirt would probably get a xs next time so it’s more fitting

This Trendy Queen Women's Long Sleeve Top is a stylish and versatile addition to any fall wardrobe. The Y2K-inspired design is both cute and fashionable, making it perfect for going out or casual wear. The top is comfortable and lightweight, with a flattering fit that works well with jeans, skirts, or leggings. The long sleeves provide just the right amount of coverage for cooler weather, and the fabric feels soft on the skin. A must-have for anyone looking to stay on trend this fall!
This looks like a pajama top. It might be cute on a teen girl, but not a woman. Sent it back.
I love this top
It looks just like the picture. My daughter got it and it's happy with it.

评论概述: Nice but tight on my arms
评论详情: I think I needed to size up for comfort in the shoulder area upper arms and forearms

评论概述: Buttery soft and fits exactly as pictured
评论详情: I recently lost weight and need some tops that fit, so on a whim I ordered this top and I am so glad I did. The price, color, softness and fit are perfect. The material is super soft and thicker than I had anticipated. I suggest ordering according to their size chart. I am 5’10, 150 pounds and all torso and the length and stretch of the Medium is perfect.
Thick material, soft and comfortable, long not cropped. Great for long torsos. Beautiful, daughter loves it!
Love
Great material and quality! Super cute! I just wish it didn’t have the silly little bow!
Fits me well .
The material was so soft and nice material. Fit really well and didn’t show my undergarments like most would. Will purchase again.
Bought 2 of these.  Great fabric.  Great shape and sexy.  Unfortunately it does run small and it will be tight.  If you have anything you want to hide this is not the shirt.

Shirt runs SUPERRRR large! I ordered two shirts in an extra small but their XS could honestly fit a Medium to Large. It’s extremely stretchy so if you like your clothes to fit tight and be form fitting, be mindful of that. Im 5FT, 95-99 pounds

This is a really cute casual pink top. It's giving pink y2k coquette and I love how it looks. It's pretty stretchy and true to size. If you have a bigger chest I recommend sizing up though. This top comes in different colors as well and I need them all!
Very soft and sleeves are perfect. Love the color too.
I felt like I could use a smaller size. I am normally large, I order m, it fits perfectly. I also don't use bra, if it's white is a little transparent but I don't care, is pretty 😍

评论概述: So soft and quality is 10/10! And affordable
评论详情: Love these wearing a small can’t beat the price and quality is so good for being so affordable
I didn't expect much and curious how the quality would be but I couldn't resist the price.  The quality is actually good! Fit and fabric both perfect for the price!

My second shirt. I loved the 1st one I bought I got the white one. No issues with off sizing in second order. These tops are soft! For the price you can't beat the quality. They are thick enough for fall but yet not too thick for Spring ( I'm in Florida and comfortable) . The colors are vivid and bright. Sizing is true to the manufacturers chart.
I got a size small. It's not as tight as I would like it to be. It's pretty basic with just a bow on the front. I thought it would be different. It's cute to dress up though!

I’m soo obsessed I wish I could wear it everyday. Fits perfectly. It’s long and tight so it slims you down. The light pink is very pretty color. The material is thick good quality and will keep you warm during the colder months!

I loved this shirt, not only because it’s great quality, but also because it’s generally hard for me to find good quality clothes and ones that fit me on amazon as a 14 year old. Color matches the picture, it fits perfectly considering i’m 4’11 and don’t usually fit adult shops/clothes, the fabric is quite soft actually. it’s also very stretchy, not scratchy at all, and comfy to wear with anything!

评论概述: Super cute… Better than I expected
评论详情: It’s actually a brighter red than I thought but surprisingly I love the cut! Super cute! Especially for the money. It’s very foreign  form fitting so it’s very flattering!! It’s sexier than I thought it would be, but definitely still in the totally socially acceptable realm!!
It's hard to find good fitting, cute black long sleeve tops but this one is adorable! I love it. Now that it's cooling off outside, it's a perfect time to stock up at that price.

评论概述: Love the color of this shirt
评论详情: It match my boots perfectly
Cute top but runs huge especially if you have a small chest, i’d recommend going two sizes down.

I got an XS, The quality is surprisingly really good! I typically don’t order online but I’m reallly happy with this shirt! (I’m 106 pounds, 5,3 with a 30inch bust) the shirt is a little tight but exactly how I wanted it. It’s super flattering, not see through at all, and really comfortable! Definitely worth it!!!
Very cute but was way too small! Not flattering for a momma with a belly. Quality was fine but bow looks cheap.
This shirt is perfect for the price! Isn’t cropped, which I admire because it seems like every shirt is nowadays. It’s so soft and stretchy too! Great quality and fit! Super flattering!
I got this for my daughter and she loves it. The fit is great and she can wear it with anything because she can wear it by itself or add a jacket to add some extra flair. Great price point.

评论概述: cute but don’t wear with lace bras
评论详情: i ordered a small. it’s cute, fits well, and looks like the pic. i tried wearing a lace bra with this and you can see the lace not being smooth underneath a bit because it’s somewhat of a thin material. just wear a normal bra. it’s not see through though, it’s very soft.  edit: so i tried wearing a normal bra and again the shirt is thin so u can see the outline of my bra in the back…. idk i got this for a work shirt so it could be a little awkward but my hair can hide it mostly idk still cute and good price
Buttery soft & cute

The shirt is super soft and very cute. I got an Xsmall, the arms are still a little big. Also, the pictures shown, show the shirt as being shorter than it is. It was quite a bit longer than expected. I can definitely tuck it in. But the material is nice and stretchy and very thick, not see through at all!

This shirt came super fast feels amazing it's like soft biker shorts it does show off all your curves but in a food way it stretches perfect and the quality is amazing for the price fits perfect definitely true to size

It cute, but it’s very tight, so if you want a looser fit, definitely order a size up! I got the red and it was also very very vibrant, so if you’re looking for a more muted red, this is definitely not it! I like the shirt a lot and it’s very flattering.
I like the way the blouse fits me I am 5'9", 155lbs, 38C bra size and I purchased the large. It is a cute, innocent and sexy blouse. I purchased it other colors as well.
Super soft and so pretty! Great material too!
Very soft and stretchy. Durable material. No worries

Such a great price, especially for the quality of the shirt. The xs fit both my sister and I, even with a two size difference in cup size. I would recommend sizing down for a more flattering fit, because we would normally go for a small. It’s so comfy, not at all sheer, and the color is the perfect cross between light and bubblegum pink. Definitely recommend!
Love this top! Material is super super nice which I was not expecting! I got a small for reference. Will prob be buying in other colors
Top is so cute! Beautiful pink color, soft material. So pleased with my purchase and I got it for $7.99. I would recommend this blouse to anybody
This piece is very soft, the material is good quality, fit is true to size, color is true to picture. Would recommend!
I’m 5’4” 135lbs and i ordered a medium it fits great and is so soft and i’m surprised you can’t tell i’m wearing a black bra lol
This was my 2nd shirt from this maker, very nice quality will not have any trouble Washing this one the material is good. It fits true to it's size and I loved it  Spandex and polyester.

评论概述: THE BEST AND CUTEST TOP EVER!!
评论详情: I feel like I wear this top faithfully after every wash LOL I need another in more colors! I love it so much and it's so freaking cute, plus very comfortable on! I can't wait to get another one like it!
Cute shirt and nice quality. Not too see through which was a bonus. I love the detail on the neckline. It's a great price which means I need more colors.
shirt is nice quality super cute and soft  i will buy in other colors !!!

评论概述: Great Shirt. Make sure you want a bow.
评论详情: This is a great shirt in a lot of ways. When I bought it though, I didn't realize that the neckline was slightly rushed with a little bow in the center. Which is great if you like that style, but I prefer a smooth unadorned front. Not their fault, though; entirely mine. Otherwise, great material and solid construction.
This top is great quality and has a stretchy material. The material is breathable as well.  Overall it is a very comfortable top.
Odd fit; unflattering fabric
very nice quality, especially for price. not see through at all. cant wait to wear once it gets colder out!!
I love this top! It’s fitted, soft, thick and stretchy material. It hugs your body. I should’ve sized up but it’s comfortable.
Nice fabric quality, fits nicely

I got the size XL and it’s a true size XL. The shirt has a fitted fit. I got the shirt in white and pink. Very comfortable! I love that shirt is long and stays down. The shirt was thick and very soft. Very durable fabric. I recommend 👍🏼🎀
The blue is more of a dark turquoise in person

As reviewed by my daughter:  This shirt is so nice and is such a good cut. The color is great and it is a soft material. It is fitted but it's also breathable and easy to layer. It is a really good basic and I would definitely get it in different colors.

This top is extremely flattering and SO cute. It's super stretchy and breathable and the quality is very good, it's not transparent at all and i would 100% repurchase in a different color. They're so soft and cozy and not to tight even if you downsize, The best part is they are super cheap and affordable. Especially since I got mine on sale for $15! Only con is the sleeves and shoulders are a tiny bit baggy. but the pros outweigh that con by a billion. I got this top in Small.

This is very well made and feels so comfortable. It has that nice buttery soft feel to it, which I love. I am larger chested and this does not make me feel too exposed. Love the tighter feel on the arms. It will be great to wear under a sweatshirt for extra warmth this winter.

This shirt is so cute. It's material is smooth and stretchy but stays tight, does not get baggy while wearing. The bow adds a pretty delicate touch to this shirt. I thought it would be cute for the fall time. Nice neckline also.
The neckline is so flattering, especially for those with smaller busts. It’s comfortable, but the material is not very breathable, so it’s a bit hot. It has a very good stretch to it though.
Sorry I have no other pics of it but I love this shirt! It’s super comfy and breathable material while not looking cheap! It does run a little small/ tight fyi. One of my fave shirts rn!
Fits very well. Looks great. The material is sturdy and stretchy, while still being comfortable and breathable. Washes well.

This is a cute basic shirt that is a crop top style with long sleeves. It is slim fitted so it does cling. As far as crop tops go it is not super short but it is on the shorter side. I really like the sweetheart neckline and the cute bow on the front. It is not super thick or see through.  Even though it is form-fitting it does have a good amount of stretch so it is not uncomfortable.

This was the highlight of the day because the color is as pictured and it is a stretchy fabric. The accent with the ruched and a bow in the middle is adorable! My teen excited to wear this top and her twin wants one in a different color as well!
Love the baby pink, love the bow, and love how soft it is. True to size!
Good quality, and well-made top. The top is made of stretchy, thick fabric. The shirt fits perfectly and looks pretty on. The little bow on the neckline is so cute. Great value for the price.

评论概述: Cute and Versatile Long Sleeve Pink Shirt
评论详情: This long sleeve pink shirt is super cute with a lovely light baby pink, pastel color. It features a little scrunch and a bow in the middle of the chest, adding a charming touch. The material is very soft, breathable, and stretchy, making it suitable for summer wear as well. It’s not thick, so it keeps you cool. I love this shirt and definitely recommend it. It pairs well with jeans, skirts, and shorts. I’ll be getting it in different colors.

The shirt came securely packaged and wrapped in plastic for safety. The material the shirt was made of was stretchy and form fitting. The style veered more towards Y2K and early 2000's which is currently trending now. Overall, a very nice addition to your summer wardrobe!

I'm 145 lbs 5'7" 32C and I ordered this top in size Large and it fits perfectly! I'm usually pretty disappointed with clothes that I order online but this one has pleasantly surprised me. The material is buttery soft. It's not too thin but not too thick. If you want a lot of cleavage... the top does ride up because it's so soft so keep that in mind. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase and for the low price, you really can't go wrong.

I needed this as an addition to my long sleeve collection, and I ordered it in the dark blue color. Very cute and form fitting! Curious if this could work for a gym shirt, but it's so cute for a daily!

Very flattering. Nice sweetheart neckline. Material is soft and similar to high quality leggings. Plenty of stretch to fit in the right places. Not too long or short and not see through , so good quality.

评论概述: Buttery soft and fits true to size!
评论详情: Ok this top surprised me because of the value and how cute it looks! I like the bow and the square neckline, I think it’s unique and feminine. The fabric reminds me of leggings I have, it’s buttery soft and it isn’t see-through at all, even when I hold it up to the light.  This top isn’t cropped and comes down to my upper hips. It’s comfortable and versatile because I can see it styled with jeans or a cute skirt. I think the quality is good and it fits true to size. Here are my measurements for reference: 32dd bust, 24 waist, 33 upper and 38 lower hips. I’m about 5 ft 3 and 110 pounds. I got a size XS and it fits as the size chart describes.
